basic.description: This course provides support and guidance to Master in Science Teaching students engaged in their half-time student teaching. The focus is on classroom management and planning, professional ethics, and state and federal school laws.
basic.subject: ISC
basic.title: Ethics, School Law, and Management of Science Classrooms

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ISC 5525 and ISC 5535. Corequisite: ISC 5946.
